did.unittitle: Philadelphia Museum of Art Marketing records

bioghist.p: From January through November 1983 Irwin W. Solomon managed the Marketing of PMA.

scopecontent.p: Records consist of Solomon's general outgoing correspondence and memos. The collection also includes subject files on city marketing plans, general marketing plans, and Museum Outreach Committee memos and reports. There are also several catalogs from vendors and other cultural institutions.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An online finding aid is available at http://www.philamuseum.org/pma_archives/search.php?c=MKT.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Philadelphia Museum of Art: Marketing and Public Relations Department records, 1955-1999; Public Relations Department records, 1922-1986.
